The American Hail Company

About TAHC

  • The American Hail Company is an automotive hail damage repair company based in central Texas that specializes in paintless dent repair (PDR).

The Challenge

  • TAHC engaged Tempest to help drive qualified leads from recent automotive hail damage victims.

The Solution

  • We created and managed targeted advertising campaigns to drive consistent leads after every hail storm within their service area.

After Tempest

Result: 462% Increase In Revenue.

The Tempest team successfully delivered over 175 leads to increase their top line revenue by 462%!
